name: Elizabeth Herbord
text: Always helpful and friendly. Food is hot and good. Restauraunt is pretty clean.

name: Matt Normington
text: We ordered ahead. It was ready and hot. Taste was good. Friendly staff definitely a good place for a date, prom dinner, wedding possibly.

name: LeAnn Kelley
text: Nasty food & dirty dishes everywhere, barley any food on salad bar or pizza side of bar. Rude employees, no refills on soda's.  Hateful attitude towards us customers. Took a long time to check out. No excuse why any of this went on. It is really sad that such a location used to do so good in many ways has gone down so bad.

name: Samual Abney
text: We went for the lunch buffet. There was little to nothing out to choose from pizza wise. It appeared to us that there were only 2 employees present, and only 1 of them actually working. She was doing alright for seating people, ringing them …More

name: marilyn powell
text: I ordered pizza online and the pizza was great.. But the female driver was rude but I still left her a tip.. Then on top of that I checked my account today and they put a hold on the amount twice even though it was already cleared and paid …More

name: deborah searcy
text: Pleasant waitress. Usual food. Quick service even though I ordered off menu during buffet  lunch time. I prefer personal pan beef only

name: Brayden Da YouTuber
text: These people now days have no respect and so unprofessional. Customer service is poor. I spent almost 50 dollars and was treated rude. It's ok the food was amazing. But ordered 18 extra hot wings paid for extra hot and only recieved one …More

name: Tad Stutsman Sr.
text: Called about 3 times a month for a year. Until the people answereing the phone can not speak plain english. "Ghetto" is not a language I'm familiar with. So until they get some people that speak normally and I can understand them I'll go somewhere else

name: Captain Console
text: Terrible table service.  This place seems to function for carry out and delivery, not eat in.  We got the wrong food brought to us. We had to get up and ask for knives and forks and we sat for 15 minutes waiting for the bill.  We just got up and went to the counter.

name: barbara rawe
text: Placed order for half meat half veggie. App does not allow for half meat lovers half veggie lover so you are forced to select which half of the pizza you would like meat lovers, then put the veggies on the other side. …More

name: V Giles
text: Pizza is delicious- speaks for itself. Fresh, hot, and only takes about 20 minutes. 4/5 stars because the staff could be more efficient. It got a little chaotic during rush hour at 5-7 PM

name: Jessica Otten
text: Customer service sucked. We had to refill our own drinks. Prices were rediculous. We were charged for dipping sauce even though we dined in. Food wasn't very good either! Won't eat here ever again!!!

name: Andrew Hegele
text: I haven't tried calling this location to place an order the phone after a bad experience with another location that simply forwards calls to a call center.  Instead, I placed my order online to reduce the chance of error. I have only been …More

name: Emily C
text: The workers here are very nice people. Not a huge fan of pizza hut but there's also rarely any pizza on buffet when I get there.

name: Carmen Stokes
text: Order was perfect and hot. Very friendly and helpful staff.

name: Frank Thoroman
text: Love the pizza. Always a favorite.

name: Coresta Andrew
text: The food was good. But the ordering of the food was horrible. I ordered online using some of my rewards points. I placed the order. Was told it would arrive around 7 pm. I called the pizza hut my order was sent to. They said they could not …More

name: David Wiseman
text: Staff was friendly, but seemed as though things were uncoordinated. The salad bar was out of lettuce so they just shut down the whole salad bar with plenty of other veggies that could be selected.

name: Larry Bud Price
text: Most of the business is delivery, the dining room is large, clean, and usually many empty seats. That means the servers are fast and friendly. Plus, it's a prime location. And the food is fabulous!

name: Kaitlin Osland
text: The servers are second to none. They always take care of us and do their best to make sure we get whatever the best deal is.

name: The Three Siblings
text: Love there deals pizza always made fresh and they are very prompt will definitely be returning and recommending other

name: Dylan Clark
text: Give our first pizza order to another customer for the fourth time

name: Melissa Klekamp
text: Haven't gotten a bad pizza yet. Wings are okay and breadsticks are always good too. Their garlic sauce rocks

name: Alvin Bick
text: Pizza Hut puts the most toppings and I'm not being paid to say that I have made at the others and believe me you don't get as much

name: Terry Woods
text: Food was typical Pizza Hut pizza. The service on the other hand, left a lot to be desired.  Restaurant was empty and I had to get our own flatware and drink refills. Server was no where to be found. I happened to notice her coming in from …More

name: Francisco Saravia
text:
Lunch buffet is pretty good. $4.99 . Sometimes the food is slow to come out and the baked spaghetti pan is very small.
Also remember to tip your "server" they do work hard.

name: KREX UZ
text: best pizza for a chain

name: Hannah Pleacoould
text: This guy named craig  that told me he was the manager told me the wrong time for salad bar. He also took his time coming out to front and his uniform looked like he had been living on the streets in it! I have wrote corporate about this with no avail! Just know I will make my family aware of pizza hut! You lost some good customers!

name: Robert Stanton
text: Don't hardly put any sauce on pizza I'll go other places

name: Ava G
text: I love the food! So delicious. I definitely think this place deserves 5 stars!! Eat here!!

name: Michael Collins
text: Online purchase and the pizza was ready on time.

name: Larry Kittrell
text: Lack of knowledge with sales and takes wayyyyyyy to long for delivery

name: Scott Fenstermacher
text: Seems like no one actually eats here, we always get carryout and the dining area is near empty. Good standard pizza fare but there are better pizza places like Razzo's or Bernie and Betty's or Gabatoni's.

name: Liv Christy
text: food is good as it is with all pizza huts but the staff all seem incompetent first of all they forgot half of my order secondly when i called and told them there was a long pause and then they just put me on hold without saying anything …More

name: Amanda Keith
text: Bad service with the servers and one manager. Then super manager made us exceptional pizzas they were amanzing. She saved my opinion of pizza hut.. Thank you for making it a turn around experience.

name: Kortney Correa
text: Ordered delivery. Was brought a 20 oz soda despite ordering and paying for a 2 liter. The breadsticks had butter on them but NO seasoning.

name: Daisy Thomas
text: Pizza hut great services most the time this time i went it was great the service was great the food was great and they treated my kids great big ups TOO my waiter and order taker on 6th street she worked nights ma'am may god bless you and may your work bare fruit in the name of Jesus amen

text: It was good buy pizza from them all the time

text: Order a pizza and I'm in a hotel... gave them the room number... delivery guy goes to wrong room the pizzas are sent back, would think the room it was sent to would say I didn't order one and they could call me back-and-forth could figure …More

text: Clean and convenient from the highway! The staff was friendly and accommodating.

name: Jeff R
text: Placed an online order. I called to check out the status an hour and a half later. I was told that they were closed because of an oven malfunction. They did not bother to tell me this. I waited for nothing. Poor customer service.

text: So I order a pizza today at 5:12 pm. They tell me it's going to be 30 mins. At 5:48 I call back they tell me it's on its way 5 or 10 minutes away at 6:12 I call ask to speak with a manager the girl tells me that there's not one and I can …More

text: This location has a lunch buffet at a reasonable price.

name: Nick Pauly
text: I don't know what's worse, ordering delivery or going to the restaurant, which is filthy, but at least you get what you order. This time was the last straw. After waiting for 2 hours, our order arrived literally cold with half of the items missing. Tried to call the store multiple times only to be hung up on by the manager.

text: Pizza and cheese sticks were made correctly and delivered early, but there was a piece of aluminium that belongs to some kind of package (posting the pic too) in the food and that was weird so as usual pizza hut is meh...
